page.title: 05Television programmes.
page.content: Our television is in the living room.My family watches it a lot.Most people have a television.My favourite programme is Dallas,which is an imported programme from America. It is about two families,both in the oil business. It is on every Wednesday at 20.10 hours on B.B.C.one,after Coronation Street, which is on Border Television.Me and my mam watch Coronation Street and Dallas because they are so good. I watch television every evening when I get home from school.Everybody I know has a television.We also watch television at school.The programmes are on all sorts of topics and are specially made for schools. A television is like a box run on electricity and when you switch it on you can watch films and sport and lots of other things.
